item.title: Find Out Release Name
item.description: How to find out release name Question I was trying to dynamically get version name inside docker for debian based image, but there is no lsb_release pre-installed Answer There is /etc/os-release/ file with all required info, also it is in form of shell env, so we can just source it and use desired variable. $ . /etc/os-release $ echo $VERSION_CODENAME buster What I Learned For ubuntu . /etc/lsb-release Links https://serverfault.
